name: Tails Adventure Fire of Robollion
description:
This game was made for Sega Game Gear, Sega's 8-bit handheld video game console. To play it is necessary to download an emulator or add the rom to a flashcard. To play on a computer, we recommend the emulators: Gearsystem, Mednafen, BlastEm, Higan or multi-core emulators such as BizHawk or RetroArch.

Special thanks

My special thanks to Supper from SMS Power. This game was only possible thanks to Supper's Tails Adventures Level Editor Suite. A comprehensive editing program for Tails Adventures, that allow fully editing most aspects of the game, such as levels, graphics, and power-ups.

And thanks to Sega.
